item.title: C - Weeder Problem
item.description: As previously stated, the device employs a rotary tool equipped with a 24 [v] DC motor to kill weeds, which may result in undesirable vibration throughout the system. After repeated use, the rotary blades may become damaged, resulting in blade imbalance. Unbalanced blades will generate a series of vibrations that will travel from the motor to the gantry. Vibrations will affect both the tool and the universal mount, dislocating them and potentially affecting their alignment and accuracy.
